verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came אַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And after כֵ֔ן <WH3651> this וַיַּ֥ךְ <WH5221> smote דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> this it came to pass that David אֶת־ <WH853> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> the Philistines וַיַּכְנִיעֵ֑ם <WH3665> and subdued וַיִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> took דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> them and David אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֥תֶג הָאַמָּ֖ה <WH4965> Methegammah מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> out of the hand פְּלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> of the Philistines

וַיַּ֣ךְ <WH5221> And he smote אֶת־ <WH853> מוֹאָ֗ב <WH4124> Moab וַֽיְמַדְּדֵ֤ם <WH4058> and measured בַּחֶ֙בֶל֙ <WH2256> them with a line הַשְׁכֵּ֣ב <WH7901> casting them down אוֹתָ֣ם <WH853> אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> to the ground וַיְמַדֵּ֤ד <WH4058> measured שְׁנֵֽי־ <WH8147> even with two חֲבָלִים֙ <WH2256> lines לְהָמִ֔ית <WH4191> he to put to death וּמְלֹ֥א <WH4393> and with one full הַחֶ֖בֶל <WH2256> line לְהַחֲי֑וֹת <WH2421> to keep alive וַתְּהִ֤י <WH1961> became מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> And [so] the Moabites לְדָוִ֔ד <WH1732> became David's לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> servants נֹשְׂאֵ֥י <WH5375> [and] brought מִנְחָֽה׃ <WH4503> gifts

וַיַּ֣ךְ <WH5221> smote דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> David אֶת־ <WH853> הֲדַדְעֶ֥זֶר <WH1909> also Hadadezer בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רְחֹ֖ב <WH7340> of Rehob מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king צוֹבָ֑ה <WH6678> of Zobah בְּלֶכְתּ֕וֹ <WH1980> went לְהָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> to recover יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his border בִּֽנְהַר־ <WH5104> at the river (פְּרָֽת <WH6578> Euphrates ק)

וַיִּלְכֹּ֨ד <WH3920> took דָּוִ֜ד <WH1732> And David מִמֶּ֗נּוּ <WH4480> at אֶ֤לֶף <WH505> from him a thousand וּשְׁבַע־ <WH7651> [chariots] and seven מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred פָּרָשִׁ֔ים <WH6571> horsemen וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> he רַגְלִ֑י <WH7273> foot soldier וַיְעַקֵּ֤ר <WH6131> houghed דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> and David אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הָרֶ֔כֶב <WH7393> all the chariot וַיּוֹתֵ֥ר <WH3498> [horses] but reserved מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> at מֵ֥אָה <WH3967> of them [for] an hundred רָֽכֶב׃ <WH7393> chariots

וַתָּבֹא֙ <WH935> came אֲרַ֣ם <WH758> And when the Syrians דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus לַעְזֹ֕ר <WH5826> to succour לַהֲדַדְעֶ֖זֶר <WH1909> Hadadezer מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king צוֹבָ֑ה <WH6678> of Zobah וַיַּ֤ךְ <WH5221> slew דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> David בַּֽאֲרָ֔ם <WH758> of the Syrians עֶשְׂרִֽים־ <WH6242> and twenty וּשְׁנַ֥יִם <WH8147> two אֶ֖לֶף <WH505> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <WH7760> put דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> Then David נְצִבִים֙ <WH5333> garrisons בַּאֲרַ֣ם <WH758> in Syria דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus וַתְּהִ֤י <WH1961> became אֲרָם֙ <WH758> and the Syrians לְדָוִ֔ד <WH1732> to David לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> became servants נוֹשְׂאֵ֣י <WH5375> [and] brought מִנְחָ֑ה <WH4503> gifts וַיֹּ֤שַׁע <WH3467> preserved יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> David בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he הָלָֽךְ׃ <WH1980> whithersoever he went

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> And David אֵ֚ת <WH853> שִׁלְטֵ֣י <WH7982> the shields הַזָּהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָי֔וּ <WH1961> become אֶ֖ל <WH413> were carried עַבְדֵ֣י <WH5650> that were on the servants הֲדַדְעָ֑זֶר <WH1909> of Hadadezer וַיְבִיאֵ֖ם <WH935> and brought יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> them to Jerusalem

וּמִבֶּ֥טַח <WH984> And from Betah וּמִבֵּֽרֹתַ֖י <WH1268> and from Berothai עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> cities הֲדַדְעָ֑זֶר <WH1909> of Hadadezer לָקַ֞ח <WH3947> took הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> king דָּוִ֛ד <WH1732> David נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> brass הַרְבֵּ֥ה <WH7235> much מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> exceeding ס

וַיִּשְׁמַ֕ע <WH8085> heard תֹּ֖עִי <WH8583> When Toi מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king חֲמָ֑ת <WH2574> of Hamath כִּ֚י <WH3588> for הִכָּ֣ה <WH5221> had smitten דָוִ֔ד <WH1732> that David אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֵ֥יל <WH2426> army הֲדַדְעָֽזֶר׃ <WH1909> of Hadadezer

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent תֹּ֣עִי <WH8583> Then Toi אֶת־ <WH853> יֽוֹרָם־ <WH3141> Joram בְּנ֣וֹ <WH1121> his son אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> unto king דָּ֠וִד <WH1732> David לִשְׁאָל־ <WH7592> ask counsel ל֨וֹ לְשָׁל֜וֹם <WH7965> favor וּֽלְבָרֲכ֗וֹ <WH1288> him and to bless עַל֩ <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> he נִלְחַ֤ם <WH3898> him because he had fought בַּהֲדַדְעֶ֙זֶר֙ <WH1909> against Hadadezer וַיַּכֵּ֔הוּ <WH5221> and smitten כִּי־ <WH3588> for אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> at מִלְחֲמ֥וֹת <WH4421> war תֹּ֖עִי <WH8583> with Toi הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> had been הֲדַדְעָ֑זֶר <WH1909> him for Hadadezer וּבְיָד֗וֹ <WH3027> And [Joram] brought with him הָי֛וּ <WH1961> had been כְּלֵֽי־ <WH3627> vessels כֶ֥סֶף <WH3701> of silver וּכְלֵֽי־ <WH3627> and vessels זָהָ֖ב <WH2091> of gold וּכְלֵ֥י <WH3627> and vessels נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <WH5178> of brass

גַּם־ <WH1571> also אֹתָ֕ם <WH853> הִקְדִּ֛ישׁ <WH6942> did dedicate הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Which also king דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> David לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD עִם־ <WH5973> with הַכֶּ֤סֶף <WH3701> with the silver וְהַזָּהָב֙ <WH2091> and gold אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הִקְדִּ֔ישׁ <WH6942> that he had dedicated מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of all nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which כִּבֵּֽשׁ׃ <WH3533> which he subdued

מֵאֲרָ֤ם <WH758> Of Syria וּמִמּוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> and of Moab וּמִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> and of the children עַמּ֔וֹן <WH5983> of Ammon וּמִפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> and of the Philistines וּמֵֽעֲמָלֵ֑ק <WH6002> and of Amalek וּמִשְּׁלַ֛ל <WH7998> and of the spoil הֲדַדְעֶ֥זֶר <WH1909> of Hadadezer בֶּן־ <WH1121> son רְחֹ֖ב <WH7340> of Rehob מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king צוֹבָֽה׃ <WH6678> of Zobah

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> gat דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> And David שֵׁ֔ם <WH8034> [him] a name בְּשֻׁב֕וֹ <WH7725> when he returned מֵהַכּוֹת֥וֹ <WH5221> from smiting אֶת־ <WH853> אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> of the Syrians בְּגֵיא־ <WH1516> in the valley מֶ֑לַח <WH4417> of salt שְׁמוֹנָ֥ה <WH8083> eight עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> thousand

וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <WH7760> And he put בֶּאֱד֜וֹם <WH123> in Edom נְצִבִ֗ים <WH5333> garrisons בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֱדוֹם֙ <WH123> throughout all Edom שָׂ֣ם <WH7760> put נְצִבִ֔ים <WH5333> he garrisons וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> became כָל־ <WH3605> and all אֱד֖וֹם <WH123> and all they of Edom עֲבָדִ֣ים <WH5650> servants לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> became David's וַיּ֤וֹשַׁע <WH3467> preserved יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> David בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he הָלָֽךְ׃ <WH1980> whithersoever he went

וַיִּמְלֹ֥ךְ <WH4427> reigned דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> And David עַל־ <WH5921> over כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> over all Israel וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become דָוִ֗ד <WH1732> and David עֹשֶׂ֛ה <WH6213> executed מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> and justice לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> unto all his people

וְיוֹאָ֥ב <WH3097> And Joab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרוּיָ֖ה <WH6870> of Zeruiah עַל־ <WH5921> over הַצָּבָ֑א <WH6635> [was] over the host וִיהוֹשָׁפָ֥ט <WH3092> and Jehoshaphat בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיל֖וּד <WH286> of Ahilud מַזְכִּֽיר׃ <WH2142> [was] recorder

וְצָד֧וֹק <WH6659> And Zadok בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחִיט֛וּב <WH285> of Ahitub וַאֲחִימֶ֥לֶךְ <WH288> and Ahimelech בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֶבְיָתָ֖ר <WH54> of Abiathar כֹּהֲנִ֑ים <WH3548> [were] the priests וּשְׂרָיָ֖ה <WH8304> and Seraiah סוֹפֵֽר׃ <WH5608> [was] the scribe

וּבְנָיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH1141> And Benaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְה֣וֹיָדָ֔ע <WH3077> of Jehoiada וְהַכְּרֵתִ֖י <WH3774> [was over] both the Cherethites וְהַפְּלֵתִ֑י <WH6432> and the Pelethites וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> sons דָוִ֖ד <WH1732> and David's כֹּהֲנִ֥ים <WH3548> were chief rulers הָיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> become פ
